directions: Cut orange segments in half and place in a bowl. Add mango, pineapple, jicama, cucumber, and banana. Add lime juice and sprinkle with chile-lime seasoning; toss to coat. Sprinkle with mint.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chile-lime seasoning (such as Tajin®), or more to taste
½ teaspoon chopped fresh mint, or to taste  (Optional)
title: Tajin® Fruit Salad
